${ModID}:Attraction.NAME: Attraction
${ModID}:Attraction.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and ${ModID}:Magnetize them. NL Gain a *Fuzz.

${ModID}:ElectronFlow.NAME: Electron Flow
${ModID}:ElectronFlow.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. Gain !M! *Polarity for each card discarded. NL Gain a *Fuzz.

${ModID}:FaradayField.NAME: Faraday Field
${ModID}:FaradayField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Magnetize your hand.

${ModID}:Ferroshield.NAME: Ferroshield
${ModID}:Ferroshield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Magnetize !M! random cards in your draw pile.

${ModID}:Fuzz.NAME: Fuzz
${ModID}:Fuzz.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if ${ModID}:Magnetized. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:InduceCurrent.NAME: Induce Current
${ModID}:InduceCurrent.DESCRIPTION: When you ${ModID}:Magnetize a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:MagneticDomain.NAME: Magnetic Domain
${ModID}:MagneticDomain.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Magnetize and discard a card. Play a ${ModID}:Magnetized card in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MagneticDomain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Magnetize and discard a card. Play a ${ModID}:Magnetized card in your discard pile.

${ModID}:PerfectedAlignment.NAME: Perfected Alignment
${ModID}:PerfectedAlignment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase by !M! for ALL your ${ModID}:Magnetized cards.

${ModID}:RepulsionField.NAME: Repulsion Field
${ModID}:RepulsionField.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a ${ModID}:Magnetized card is discarded or Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Superconductance.NAME: Superconductance
${ModID}:Superconductance.DESCRIPTION: When you ${ModID}:Magnetize a card this turn, reduce its cost by !M! this turn until played.
